name: maze & birb
description:
*****

Game made for What-A-Jam! by Sam PC. 

The prompts were "shortcuts" and "pizza".

In this game you search a maze for golden artifacts. You can jump over walls, but watch out for the birds - they swoop at anything that appears over a certain height. Be quick, or distract them by throwing pizza!

*****

Controls:

WASD: move 

Space: jump

LEFT-SHIFT: throw pizza

MOUSE DRAG: look around

*****

Note: throwing pizza works best when you are over the wall already

*****

Things I didn't make:

Eagle model:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/birds/egypt-pack-eag...

Skybox:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-skyboxes-te...
